snippet: The sights? Yellow and blue feathers, unusual instruments. The sounds? Straight from the bands that drive New Orleans parades and Brazilian carnivals, united for Lincoln Center Out of Doors.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performances by bands Big Chief Boudreaux and the Golden Eagles, Maracatu Nacao Estrela Brilhante and Nation Beat as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival at Damrosch Park.
lead_paragraph: The sights? Yellow and blue feathers, unusual instruments. The sounds? Straight from the bands that drive New Orleans parades and Brazilian carnivals, united for Lincoln Center Out of Doors.

headline.seo: New Orleans and Brazil Bring Beats to Lincoln Center
headline.main: Venerable Traditions Meet to Stimulate Eyes, Ears and Souls
headline.print_headline: Venerable Traditions Meet to Stimulate Eyes, Ears and Souls

keywords.value: Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival
